participant_1.background:
I love children.
I am twenty two years old.
I just moved into an apartment within the vicinity of my new job.
I just graduated college with my bachelor s degree in education.

participant_2.background:
As a child , i won a national spelling bee.
I have a severe phobia of wide open spaces.
I have been published in the new yorker magazine.
I am a gourmet cook.

content.text: I'm 22 years old and I just graduated from college with a bachelor's degree in education. I'm really excited to start my career as a teacher.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be a great teacher. I'm 40 years old and I've been published in The New Yorker magazine. I'm also a gourmet cook and I have a severe phobia of wide open spaces.

Wow, that's impressive! I've never been published in a magazine before. I'm not sure I'd be able to cook like a gourmet chef, but I do love to cook. And I have a phobia of spiders, but not wide open spaces.
That's funny, I'm not afraid of spiders, but I am afraid of wide open spaces.
What's your favorite thing about being a gourmet cook?
I love the creativity of it. I love coming up with new recipes and trying new things.
That sounds really fun. I wish I had more of a creative side.
You can always learn! There are a lot of great resources available online.
I'll have to check that out.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
No problem. It was nice talking to you.
You too. Have a great day!
